projects.title: Evia Aesthetics
projects.shortDescription: Premium medical aesthetics platform for a leading NYC physician
projects.longDescription: Dr. Evia Nano, MD needed a sophisticated digital presence that reflects the precision and luxury of her medical aesthetics practice. We crafted a premium website with integrated booking, patient education resources, and a design language that conveys clinical excellence with warmth.
projects.challenge: Creating a website that balances clinical credibility with the luxury aesthetics experience clients expect, while meeting healthcare compliance standards.
projects.solution: We designed an elegant, conversion-optimized platform with intuitive service navigation, before-and-after galleries, and seamless appointment booking integration.
projects.impact: Elevated the practice's digital presence to match its premium positioning, driving significant new patient acquisition and establishing authority in the competitive NYC medical aesthetics market.

testimonial.text: Elan understood exactly what my practice needed â€” a website that feels as premium as the experience I provide my patients. The result exceeded my expectations.
testimonial.author: Dr. Evia Nano, MD

projects.title: Holistic Psychological Services
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive psychological services platform with integrated scheduling
projects.longDescription: Holistic Psychological Services required a professional, calming digital presence that reflects their compassionate approach to mental wellness. We built a comprehensive platform with integrated appointment scheduling, a resource library, and multi-location support.
projects.challenge: Creating a platform that feels welcoming and reduces barriers to seeking psychological help while maintaining professional credibility and HIPAA considerations.
projects.solution: Designed a warm, approachable website with calming aesthetics, easy-to-navigate service pages, integrated scheduling, and multi-location directory for their growing practice.
projects.impact: The platform successfully launched across multiple locations, streamlined patient intake, and significantly increased new client inquiries through improved search visibility.

testimonial.text: The website perfectly captures the welcoming, professional atmosphere of our practice. Patients tell us all the time how easy it is to navigate and book appointments.
testimonial.author: Doug Uhlig

projects.title: Laura's Beauty Touch
projects.shortDescription: Premium beauty clinic website with successful Google Ads campaign
projects.longDescription: Laura's Beauty Touch wanted to establish a strong digital presence that matched the luxury experience of their physical location. We created a stunning website with an elegant design and integrated booking system.
projects.challenge: Standing out in a saturated beauty market while conveying the premium, luxury experience that Laura's clinic provides.
projects.solution: We designed a visually stunning website with professional photography and implemented strategic Google Ads targeting affluent demographics.
projects.impact: Increased bookings by 180%, attracted high-value clients with 40% higher average transaction value, achieved 4.8/5 Google rating.

testimonial.text: Working with Elan was seamless. They understood our vision and delivered a stunning website that perfectly represents our brand. The Google Ads campaign has been incredibly effective!
testimonial.author: Laura Sholomov

projects.title: Child & Family Psychological Services
projects.shortDescription: Compassionate therapy practice platform for children and families
projects.longDescription: Child & Family Psychological Services needed a warm, approachable digital presence that speaks to both parents seeking help for their children and families navigating psychological challenges. We built a comprehensive platform that balances clinical professionalism with the warmth and trust families need when seeking care.
projects.challenge: Creating a website that appeals to both parents seeking help for their children and to families as a whole, while maintaining professional credibility and reducing the stigma often associated with seeking psychological services.
projects.solution: Designed a friendly yet professional platform with calming aesthetics, intuitive service navigation for different age groups and family needs, integrated scheduling, and educational resources that help families understand the therapeutic process.
projects.impact: The platform helped increase new patient inquiries significantly, made it easier for families to find the right services, and established the practice as a trusted resource in the community.

testimonial.text: Elan created a website that makes families feel comfortable and safe reaching out for help. It's professional but not intimidating, which is exactly what our practice needed.
testimonial.author: Kristie Doheny

projects.title: Iconic Aesthetics
projects.shortDescription: Complete digital transformation with integrated booking and POS systems
projects.longDescription: Iconic Aesthetics needed a complete digital overhaul to modernize their brand and streamline operations. We delivered a premium website featuring a fully integrated booking system, Square POS integration, and comprehensive marketing automation.
projects.challenge: Iconic Aesthetics was losing clients to competitors with better online booking systems. Their manual scheduling process was time-consuming and prone to errors.
projects.solution: We developed a custom website with real-time booking synchronization, automated appointment reminders, and seamless POS integration.
projects.impact: Within 3 months of launch, online bookings increased by 145%, administrative time decreased by 70%, and client satisfaction improved dramatically.

testimonial.text: Elan transformed our entire digital presence. The integrated booking system alone has saved us countless hours and our online bookings increased by 145%. Absolutely phenomenal work!
testimonial.author: Ilanit Sholomov

projects.title: Barber World NYC
projects.shortDescription: E-commerce platform generating $12K revenue in first month
projects.longDescription: Barber World NYC wanted to expand beyond their brick-and-mortar location by launching an online store. We created a comprehensive e-commerce platform with 76 products, automated inventory management, and integrated digital marketing.
projects.challenge: The client had no online presence and needed to quickly establish an e-commerce platform that could handle inventory across both physical and digital storefronts.
projects.solution: We built a Shopify-based e-commerce platform with custom theme development, integrated inventory management syncing with their physical POS system.
projects.impact: Achieved 100+ sales in the first month, generated $12K in revenue, expanded customer reach by 300%.

testimonial.text: The e-commerce platform Elan built for us is incredible. Our sales tripled in the first quarter. The inventory management system makes running our business so much easier.
testimonial.author: Management Team

projects.title: Doug Uhlig Psychological Services
projects.shortDescription: HIPAA-compliant platform generating 625 new clients in first year
projects.longDescription: Dr. Doug Uhlig needed a complete digital transformation for his psychology practice. We created a fully HIPAA-compliant website with a secure patient portal, telehealth capabilities, and integrated marketing systems.
projects.challenge: Creating a platform that balances user experience with strict HIPAA compliance requirements while integrating telehealth capabilities.
projects.solution: We developed a custom HIPAA-compliant platform with end-to-end encryption, secure patient portal, and integrated telehealth video sessions.
projects.impact: Generated 625 new clients in year one, achieved 100% HIPAA compliance certification, improved patient satisfaction by 85%.

testimonial.text: As a psychology practice, HIPAA compliance is absolutely critical. Elan delivered a secure, professional website with a patient portal that meets all requirements. The marketing campaign brought in 625 new clients in our first year!
testimonial.author: Douglas Uhlig, Ph.D.
